A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lifelong Star Wars fan\, and I genuinely enjoyed The Last Jedi! There are a few nit picky issues I have\, but overall the story was awesome. It had me thinking back on previous movies including the Clone Wars animated series. I left feeling ready for episode 9. It made me nostalgic and ready for the future all at once. My advice\, go in without any set ideas on how you believe it should go\, sit back\, and enjoy.
